description:
Takagi Akito is the second main protagonist. He starts out as one of http://anidb.net/ch16785 [Mashiro Moritaka]`s classmate and after discovering Mashiro`s talent in drawing in school, he proposed that they try to publish a manga together. Although Mashiro originally refuses, the two begin to work together after he takes Mashiro to http://anidb.net/ch16784 [Azuki]`s house and Azuki and Mashiro decide to get married after their dreams come true. He eventually dates and becomes married to Azuki`s best friend http://anidb.net/ch16786 [Miyoshi Kaya]. Takagi is a writer and writes the storylines for the pair`s manga. The two started working under the pen name http://anidb.net/ch20022 [Ashirogi Muto]. Takagi specializes in unorthodox story lines.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Takagi Akito
